nodes.text: This single-pod cloud car was a small airspeeder utilized as security by the Quingarus Deluxe Droid Systems Factory.
The cloud car was similar in design to the Storm IV Twin-Pod cloud car, but with a single pod.

During the Clone Wars, two such airspeeders intercepted Obi-Wan Kenobi's fighter, informing him that he was in a restricted area and they would escort him off-world unless he clarified his business. After he did so, the speeder pilots directed him towards a landing bay.
